channel.title: Java环境变量 on 52zgd.com - 代码搬运工
channel.description: Recent content in Java环境变量 on 52zgd.com - 代码搬运工

item.title: unbantu下配置java
item.description:
@(unbantu)[java]

    sudo gedit ~/.bashrc
    export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-7-sun
    export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jre
    export CLASSPATH=.:${JAVA_HOME}/lib:${JRE_HOME}/lib
    export PATH=${JAVA_HOME}/bin:$PATH 
    source ~/.bashrc
